entries.title: Twitter brings Elon Musk’s genius reputation crashing down to earth
entries.description: Musk went down conspiracy rabbit holes and sank Tesla's stock with his behavior. And he was confronted with a chorus of boos in the cradle of the tech industry.

entries.title: Here’s who helped Elon Musk buy Twitter
entries.description: Elon Musk didn't buy Twitter on his own. From Qatar to Jack Dorsey and Binance, meet the people who helped fund the acquisition.
